Description: Pale-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a large convex vessel, interior grooved and exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip, with remains of at least nine lines of thickly black-painted demotic text on the exterior, smudged and faded in places.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (389824) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/389824)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
